sexAction.title: Decorated doughnut
sexAction.tooltip: The filly slut has turned your asshole into a fancy doughnut!

description.text:
#IF(npc==natalya) [natalya.speechNoEffects(Filly! Fetch me a mirror and show me what it looks like!)] Mistress Natalya demands. Callie helpfully points to one side of the counter, and you quickly discover and retrieve a small mirror from the place where the horse-girl motioned towards. Holding this mirror bahind your Mistress's feral equine rump, you enable her to turn her head and see the state of her asshole.

[natalya.speechNoEffects(Excellent job, filly!)] the centauress happily declares, before flashing you a horny grin and teasing, [natalya.speechNoEffects(Now you can eat it!)] #ELSE [callie.speechNoEffects(Great job, [pc.name],)] Callie giggles, before biting her lip and moaning, [callie.speechNoEffects(Now for the best part...)] #ENDIF
